Kristy Bleau
============

[City Council](http://www.lakedallas.com/Directory.aspx?DID=12)  
Title: Mayor  
Phone: 940-497-2226, x102
  
[Email](mailto:kbleau@lakedallas.com)

1. **City Hall**
   -------------

   212 Main Street  
   Lake Dallas, TX 75065  
   Phone: (940) 497-2226  
      
   **City Hall Hours -**  
   Monday - Thursday  
   7:30 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.  
   Friday  
   7:30 a.m. - 11:00 a.m.  
     
   **Service Window Hours-**  
   Monday - Thursday  
   8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.  
   Friday  
   8:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m.
